018package org.tquadrat.foundation.value;
019
020import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
021import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
022import static org.tquadrat.foundation.value.Area.SQUARE_METER;
023
024import java.io.Serial;
025import java.math.BigDecimal;
026
027import org.apiguardian.api.API;
028import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
029import org.tquadrat.foundation.value.api.ValueBase;
030
031/**
032 *  A value class for areas.
033 *
034 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
035 *  @version $Id: AreaValue.java 880 2021-02-27 10:47:40Z tquadrat $
036 *  @since 0.1.0
037 *
038 *  @UMLGraph.link
039 */
040@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: AreaValue.java 880 2021-02-27 10:47:40Z tquadrat $" )
041@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
042public final class AreaValue extends ValueBase<Area, AreaValue>
043{
044        /*------------------------*\
045    ====** Static Initialisations **===========================================
046        \*------------------------*/
047    /**
048     *  The serial version UID for objects of this class: {@value}.
049     *
050     *  @hidden
051     */
052    @Serial
053    private static final long serialVersionUID = 1729884766468723788L;
054
055        /*--------------*\
056    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
057        \*--------------*/
058    /**
059     *  Creates a new {@code AreaValue} instance.
060     *
061     *  @param  dimension   The dimension.
062     *  @param  value   The value.
063     */
064    public AreaValue( final Area dimension, final BigDecimal value )
065    {
066        //---* Daddy's performing the null check ... *-------------------------
067        super( dimension, value );
068    }   //  AreaValue()
069
070    /**
071     *  Creates a new {@code AreaValue} instance.
072     *
073     *  @param  dimension   The dimension.
074     *  @param  value   The value; it must be possible to parse the given
075     *      String into a
076     *      {@link BigDecimal}.
077     *  @throws NumberFormatException   The provided value cannot be converted
078     *      into a {@code BigDecimal}.
079     */
080    public AreaValue( final Area dimension, final String value ) throws NumberFormatException
081    {
082        //---* Daddy's performing the null check ... *-------------------------
083        super( dimension, value );
084    }   //  AreaValue()
085
086    /**
087     *  Creates a new {@code AreaValue} instance.
088     *
089     *  @param  <N> The type of {@code value}.
090     *  @param  dimension   The dimension.
091     *  @param  value   The value.
092     */
093    public <N extends Number> AreaValue( final Area dimension, final N value )
094    {
095        //---* Daddy's performing the null check ... *-------------------------
096        super( dimension, value );
097    }   //  AreaValue()
098
099    /**
100     *  Creates a new {@code AreaValue} instance. An area can be determined by
101     *  multiplication of length and width.
102     *
103     *  @param  dimension   The dimension.
104     *  @param  length  The length.
105     *  @param  width   The width.
106     */
107    public AreaValue( final Area dimension, final LengthValue length, final LengthValue width )
108    {
109        super( SQUARE_METER, requireNonNullArgument( length, "length" ).baseValue().multiply( requireNonNullArgument( width, "width" ).baseValue() ) );
110        setUnit( requireNonNullArgument( dimension, "dimension" ) );
111    }   //  AreaValue()
112
113        /*---------*\
114    ====** Methods **==========================================================
115        \*---------*/
116    /**
117     *  {@inheritDoc}
118     */
119    @Override
120    public final AreaValue clone()
121    {
122        @SuppressWarnings( "cast" )
123        final var retValue = super.clone();
124
125        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
126        return retValue;
127    }   //  clone()
128}
129//  class AreaValue
130
131/*
132 *  End of File
133 */
